revised_title: Investigating the Parallax of α Lyrae: A Study of Instrument Accuracy
tldr: This paper examines the parallax of α Lyrae and the accuracy of instruments at Dublin and Greenwich. The author analyzes the differences in parallax between y Draconis and α Lyrae, as well as the absolute parallax of α Lyrae. The study highlights the imperfections in observations and the uncertainty in the mean, leading to inconclusive results about the actual magnitude of the annual parallax.
